Regulation Name(s): Gastrointestinal Microorganism Multiplex Nucleic Acid Based Assay
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for RIDA®GENE Norovirus GI/GII real-time RT-PCR assay for qualitative detection and differentiation of norovirus GI and GII RNA in human stool specimens
Indications for Use Summary: Aids in the differential diagnosis of norovirus GI and GII infections in patients with symptoms of acute gastroenteritis by qualitative detection and differentiation of norovirus GI and GII RNA from raw or unpreserved stool specimens, used in conjunction with clinical evaluation, laboratory findings, and epidemiological information
